metadata.title: CVE-2024-2201 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
[x86: Native Branch History Injection]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-187-generic - 5.4.0-187.207
linux-image-5.4.0-187-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-187.207
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-187-generic - 5.4.0-187.207
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-187-lowlatency - 5.4.0-187.207
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-106-generic - 5.15.0-106.116~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-106-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-106.116~20.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-187.207').
